all right thanks Deepa so uh the example company now wants to deploy uh a wide
variety of applications uh for various of their employees that are joining them so today we announced Amazon workspaces
application manager uh will walk you through how this can actually enable that example company to deploy uh a lot
of apps on demand uh so managing applications for user depending on the roles and the
organization uh or example company may have different needs to deploy and
manage applications they have their line of business applications that they may need to deploy to their employees or
they may already have existing applications for which they already own licenses uh through their Enterprise
agreements uh or there may be a scenario where they want to procure software on demand for lot of their a lot of their
employees so uh Amazon vam uh allows us to deploy applications at scale uh
without requiring any upfront investment or upfront infrastructure so you pay for what you use and the way we actually
deploy applications is through a concept called virtualized app containers so through this mechanism we can actually
deploy apps as isolated containers which actually decouples the applications from
the operating system so this allows Enterprises to easily manage the applications at scale and also being
able to customize that so uh what the with the concept of
this application containers now an organization does not necessarily always have to worry about how do I just create
all the applications into a base image so now this gives them the flexibility to actually allow their end users to
pick and choose the application that they want as long as it's approved by their organization and the IT administrators
now can actually curate applications on each user specific so if example company
has hundreds of uh contract employees and they're based in different uh organizations let's say some of them are
in finance some of them are in customer survey some of them are in uh as knowledge workers they can pick and
choose and say each role and organization within an organization can be assigned a specific set of
applications in a customized manner while they do this uh we also
provide the capability ility to integrate uh your active directory so you can actually enumerate your active
directory users and groups you search your users in groups and you actually assign applications to your
organization's active directory users and then be able to track the usage of which applications have been assigned to
what users and how how are they actually using it and what is the current usage
of the apps so this helps organizations to better cost uh to track the cost very
effectively and to figure out what is the right licensing model for the applications that they use depending on
their organization needs the big thing that we also allow us to offer is the low cost so there are
three elements to this is one uh organizations don't need to necessarily spend a lot of upfront investment to
build out the infrastructure to deploy and manage applications two organizations typically spend quite a
bit of infrastructure to actually package and U manage the applications uh they typically set up their own test
labs and they actually have to make investment the third one is they end up buying licenses without really
understanding how the applications are being used so we Amazon V helps you to kind of track uh solve all of these
challenges and reduce the low cost there so in pictorially uh you can uh shop for
apps from the AWS Marketplace for desktops or you can bring your line of business applications or applications
for it and then you added to your application catalog and these uh once you added your application catalog uh
Amazon vam allows you to deploy apps in the form of containers in a very secure way to your to your users who are using
Amazon workspaces so this way you can dynamically uh assign apps on demand to
figure out which users get what for example you could say Financial um folks
within the financial organization uh will need a following set of apps and you can specifically assign those apps
and they will be uh getting the right set of apps there uh we also are providing uh uh two ways
to build your application catalog the first one is through AWS Marketplace for uh desktop apps uh this section of our
Marketplace will offer desktop apps on a monthly subscription model uh we will be
offering over 100 titles uh in about 11 categories uh you can browse uh the
catalog you can subscribe to apps and you can instantly assign apps to user completely simplifying your software

appropriate uh the second model in which you can uh
build your application catalog is you may uh as a company have a lot of lineup business apps or apps that you already

import your uh applications into your catalog uh first we allow you to launch
an ec2 instance with Amazon vam admin studio uh this studio uh allows you to
import your application there uh application installer run through a sort of packaging process and actually create

admin player which allows you to give you the option to uh test these containers and qualify them for your

from the operating system and only the application uh dependencies are all managed there or if you want to set the
